text:
Tomyam base soup was tasty.
Marinated chicken was fresh and delicious.
Premium Meat Quality with affordable price served with homemade Chili source.
Highly recommended for everyone!

Garlic sliced pork was well marinated, served tasty sauces with generous serving of vegetables in their platter (their tray and plates were clean too!) along with efficient & courteous service by staff, will visit again!
the food was very nice, fresh and value for moneyüëçüèªespecially both of the beef with high quality üëçüèª

Great value for money with excellent service and generous portions. As others have mentioned, the garlic pork was very good. We also had the tom yum soup base (+$3) which was quite spicy but can be adjusted by diluting some clear base to suit your taste. Overall I think this is the best mookata in Toa Payoh so far!

First time tried Thai Mookata. Surprising this stall never disappoint me, the food are fresh and lots of choices. The handmade marinated meats tasted awesome and flavourful. Reasonable price for the portion of food, will come back anytime ::::))))
